item.description:
Specific Topic: Fun With Language

Come and have some fun as we learn and play some games with language patterns that can be extremely valuable to you in both personal life and career.

  1. Learn to understand and challenge subtle beliefs
  2. Learn how to come up on top in arguments and debates
  3. Learn to use language to more effectively get your point across
  4. Learn how to use language to persuade and convince more effectively

We will be introducing some language models and playing some interesting and fun games.


Come Learn and Play!!

Â 


Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin 978-273-5905 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Methuen - Fun With Language
